Class RGBImage

java.lang.Object
  RGBColor
      RGBImage

public class RGBImage
extends RGBColor

MMN 13 Q1 RGBImage Represents a color image using a two-dimensional array of objects from the Department RGBColor. Each point in the image is a pixel representing a single coordinate point.

Version:
(MMN 13 Q1 12/11/2014)
Author:
(Oz Maatuk)
